Package uk.co.llblumire.coursework

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Entity
    Interface implemented by Entities.
    Renderer
    Interface implemented by classes that facilitate rendering something to a graphics context.
    Updater
    Interface implemented by classes that facilitate being updated with respect to an entity in an Environment, and the passage of time.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CircleRenderer
    A Renderer for drawing circles.
    Collider
    Collider provides a number of different types of collider to check if arbitrary bounds are colliding.
    Collider.BoxCollider
    Collides with anything that intersects it's bounding box.
    Collider.LineCollider
    Collides with anything that intersects the line segment.
    Collider.NoCollider
    Collides with nothing.
    CompositionalRenderer
    Allows composing multiple Renderers into one Renderer.
    Environment
    An environment in which Entities can be kept.
    Gui
    Controls the front-facing user interface of the application.
    LightEmmiter
    Emits a field of light onto the Environment.
    LightSensorRobot
    A robot that moves as a simple robot until it detects a decrease in light levels, at which point it begins to turn to return to the light.
    LineColliderEntity
    An invisible immutable entity that has only a LineCollider.
    LineRenderer
    A Renderer for drawing lines.
    NoRenderer
    A Renderer that draws nothing.
    NoUpdater
    An Updater that updates nothing.
    RectangleRenderer
    Renderer that draws a rectangle to a graphics context.
    RGBA
    Serializable Color Representation
    SimpleRobot
    A simple robot that moves in straight lines around the Arena, if it detects it has collided with something, it will rotate until and try to move until it no longer collides with anything.
    StaticBlock
    An unmoving block.
    Wall
    Walls represent a point to point barrier in an environment.
    WheelRenderer
    Renders the Wheels of a Robot.
    Whisker
    A whisker as used by WhiskerRobot to sense it's surroundings.
    WhiskerRobot
    A robot with whiskers, if the whiskers feel a collision they will cause the robot to turn away.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Collider.CollisionStatus
    The status of a collision
